entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 1:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
